title: Intermediate Accounting Concept Comprehension Through Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic accounting principles and practical experience
context.additional_context: An intermediate-level accounting education program for practicing professionals, requiring the use of smartphone-based digital tools in PC-unavailable environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain accounting concepts through visual metaphors by applying digital storytelling techniques.
Learners can logically articulate the financial statement analysis process in alignment with a storyline structure.
Learners can collaboratively produce a digital storytelling presentation on accounting case studies with peers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
